commit message: Add basic .gitignore
Use 'New Android Application' wizard to create empty project

Add DashClock API JAR

Source:
https://code.google.com/p/dashclock/downloads/detail?name=dashclock-api-r1.1.jar

Add sources JAR for DashClock API JAR

Source:
https://code.google.com/p/dashclock/downloads/detail?name=dashclock-api-r1.1-sources.jar

Add empty DashClockExtension

This is enough to show up in DashClock's list of extensions.
Display static text in DashClock
Add icon to be displayed in DashClock
Add helper class to interface with K-9 Mail
Add code to display the unread count for all K-9 Mail accounts
Display number of unread messages per account
Add broadcast receiver to be notified of changes in K-9 Mail
Include DashClock API source instead of using the JAR
Perform updates triggered by broadcast intent in background thread
Start K-9 Mail when extension is clicked
Use 'Android Activity' wizard to create settings activity
Change action bar to match the style of the other settings activities
Modify settings activity to be able to select K-9 Mail accounts
Only show unread count for selected accounts
Add license
Check if K-9 Mail is installed and set up

Better handle edge cases

Don't make the settings screen show stuff like '3 of 1 accounts
selected'.
Leave the account selection preference disabled if there are no
accounts to select.
Add about dialog
Change app icon
Add version name to about dialog
Don't crash when accounts couldn't be retrieved
Support K-9 Mail 4.2x by cheating (use account number as UUID)
